Sintel Optical Flow
###################

The MPI Sintel Flow Dataset is a dataset for the evaluation of optical flow derived from the open source 3D animated
short film, Sintel.

- To download the dataset and have more information, `follow this link <http://sintel.is.tue.mpg.de/>`_.
- The main conference paper for more detailed information is available `here <http://files.is.tue.mpg.de/black/papers/ButlerECCV2012-corrected.pdf>`_. Other references are listed in the previous link.


SintelFlowDataset API
*********************

   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
